get.description: Retrieve all addresses for the authenticated customer

post.description: Create a new address for the authenticated customer

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific address

404.description: Address not found or failed to delete

post.description: Set a specific address as the default address for the customer

get.summary: Get all orders for a store (admin/owner)
get.description: Retrieve paginated list of orders for a specific store with filtering and search capabilities. Requires admin or store owner authentication.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by customer email, name, or order ID

get.description: Retrieve complete details of a specific order including items and addresses

put.description: Update the status of an order. Cannot update delivered or cancelled orders. Cancelling an order automatically restores product stock.

400.description: Invalid status or cannot update this order

put.description: Update the payment status of an order
Add or update tracking number for an order. Automatically updates order status to 'shipped' if currently 'processing'.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive order statistics including overview, recent orders, and daily stats for a date range

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Start date for stats (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to 30 days ago.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End date for stats (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

post.description: Update the status of multiple orders at once. Delivered and cancelled orders will be skipped. Cancelling orders automatically restores product stock.
Authenticate super admin and receive JWT token
Authenticate client and receive JWT token
Register a new client account and receive JWT token

get.description: Verify if a JWT token is valid and get user information

post.description: Exchange refresh token for a new access token
Logout user (client-side token removal)
Change authenticated user's password

401.description: Current password is incorrect or unauthorized

get.description: Get customer's shopping cart with items, totals, and validation issues. Returns empty cart for unauthenticated users.

post.description: Add a product to the shopping cart. Requires authentication. Validates stock availability.

400.description: Product not available or insufficient stock

delete.description: Remove all items from the shopping cart

put.description: Update quantity of a cart item. Set quantity to 0 to remove item.

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the shopping cart

post.description: Merge session cart items with database cart when user logs in

get.description: Retrieve list of categories for a specific store with filtering options

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Filter by parent category ID (use 'null' for top-level categories)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by category name or description

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of categories to return

post.description: Create a new category for a store (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a specific category with subcategories and product count

delete.description: Delete a category and unlink associated products (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a category by its slug for a specific store
Get categories with the most products

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of categories to return

get.description: Retrieve all orders for the authenticated customer
Retrieve complete details of a specific order including items and addresses

post.description: Create an order from cart (registered customers) or from provided items (guest checkout). Supports both registered and guest customers.

shipping_address.description: New shipping address (if shipping_address_id not provided)

400.description: Cart empty, insufficient stock, or invalid data

get.description: Track order status using order ID and email. No authentication required - useful for guest customers.

400.description: Order ID and email are required

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of clients with statistics (Admin only)

post.description: Create a new client account (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve client details with stores (Admin only)

delete.description: Delete a client and all associated data (Admin only)

post.description: Register a new customer for a specific store. If a guest account exists with the same email, it will be converted to a registered account.
Authenticate a customer and receive JWT token. Optionally sync session cart with database cart.

get.description: Get authenticated customer's profile including addresses, order count, total spent, and cart count

put.description: Update customer's profile information (first_name, last_name, phone)

post.description: Change customer's password. Guest accounts cannot change password.
Logout customer. Client should remove token from storage.
Upload a single image file to Cloudinary storage

public_id.description: Optional custom public_id for the image

400.description: Invalid request or file validation failed

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Upload multiple image files to Cloudinary storage

images[].description: Array of image files to upload

post.description: Upload an image to Cloudinary from an external URL

delete.description: Delete an image using its public_id

parameters.name: publicId
parameters.description: The public_id of the image to delete (URL encoded)

get.description: Get detailed information about an image from Cloudinary

parameters.name: publicId
parameters.description: The public_id of the image (URL encoded)

post.description: Generate a URL for a transformed version of an image

get.description: Retrieve list of orders for a specific store with filtering options

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return

post.description: Create a new order for a store

get.description: Retrieve detailed order information including order items

put.description: Update the status of an existing order

400.description: Invalid status or status is required

get.description: Retrieve order statistics and analytics for a specific store
Retrieve list of products for a specific store with filtering options

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by product name or description

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of products to return

post.description: Add a new product to a store

get.description: Retrieve detailed product information including images

delete.description: Delete a product from the store

get.description: Retrieve products that are running low on stock for inventory management

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Stock quantity threshold for low stock alert

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of stores with filtering options

post.description: Create a new online store for a client

store_slug.description: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

get.description: Retrieve store details with optional customization data

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include related data (use 'customization' to include customization details)

store_slug.description: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

delete.description: Delete a store and all associated data (products, orders, etc.)

post.description: Generate static HTML/CSS files for the store based on template and customization

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token obtained from login endpoint

info.title: LivePetal E-Commerce Platform API
info.description: Multi-tenant e-commerce platform with JWT authentication. This API allows super admins to manage clients and their stores, while clients can manage their products and orders.
